## Shiny Test

Install and import [NHANES package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/NHANES/refman/NHANES.html).s

```{r}
# renv::install("NHANES")
library(NHANES)
```

```{r}
data(NHANES)
```

```{r}
# renv::install("medicaldata")
library(medicaldata)
```

## rdhs package to access Demographic and Health Survey Data

Note: *you need to register for an account with DHS to be able to access data through the **rdhs** package.* Instructions [here](https://docs.ropensci.org/rdhs/).

```{r}
# renv::install("rdhs")
library(rdhs)
```

```{r}
# renv::install("MedDataSets")
library(MedDataSets)
```

```{r}
data()
```
